item.title: Realms of Gold Deluxe
item.description: Help Odysseus find his way home in Realms of Gold Deluxe. Swap colorful pieces to create matching groups of three or more to move your hero across the board and to the exit.

item.title: Delicious winter edition Deluxe
item.description: Get your apron on! In the busy month of December Emily could sure use some extra help in Delicious winter edition Deluxe.

item.title: Diner Dash - Flo on the Go Deluxe
item.description: In Diner Dash: Flo on the Go Deluxe, Flo is busier than ever. With new customers ranging from tourists to lovebirds, this is the best Diner Dash game ever!

item.title: The Legend of El Dorado Deluxe
item.description: Join an expedition through the South American rainforest in The Legend of El Dorado Deluxe. The map of the Conquistadores shows you the way. Does El Dorado really exist? Seek out the gold!

item.title: Plantasia Deluxe
item.description: Let everything around you blossom and flourish in Plantasia Deluxe. Plant seeds, water them and the miraculous flowers will shoot up in an instant. Get planting!

item.title: Super TextTwist Deluxe
item.description: How many words can you create from 6 or 7 letters? You have two and a half minutes! Create as many words as possible in Super TextTwist Deluxe.

item.title: Cake Mania Deluxe
item.description: Baking runs in Jill's family. Cake Mania Deluxe dares you to see if you have what it takes to help Jill earn enough money to reopen her grandparents bakery in this fast-paced culinary crisis!

item.title: Zuma Deluxe
item.description: Play Zuma Deluxe whenever you want! 13 new levels to conquer!

item.title: Mahjong Fortuna 2 Deluxe
item.description: A serene sense of tranquility will descend upon you as you play Mahjong Fortuna 2 Deluxe. It's packed with information about your horoscope, element, birth stone, birth flower and the Celtic Tree of Life.

item.title: Mahjongg Fortuna Deluxe
item.description: Play Mahjongg Fortuna Deluxe whenever you want! Choose from different settings and tile sets!

item.title: Bookworm Deluxe
item.description: Play Bookworm Deluxe whenever you want! Make words up to 12 letters long and try the new Action game.

item.title: Jewel Quest Deluxe
item.description: Play Jewel Quest Deluxe whenever you want! Extended and challenging new puzzles!

item.title: Chainz 2 Deluxe
item.description: Re-enter the exciting realm of link-matching madness with Chainz 2. Rotate colored links to make matches of three or more. Use 4-way Link to make matches around corners.

item.title: Gold Rush Deluxe
item.description: Play Gold Rush Deluxe whenever you want! More tools and new bonuses!

item.title: Ocean Express Deluxe
item.description: Ocean Express is a puzzle game that is both addictive and fun! Pack the colorful cargo perfectly on an ocean liner so that all the pieces fit perfectly together.

item.title: Pirate Poppers Deluxe
item.description: Calling all landlubbers! All aboard and hoist the sails for Pirate Poppers Deluxe! Fire cannonballs, catch the jewels and treasures and hide your booty in the Treasure Cove.

item.title: TriJinx Deluxe
item.description: Is Kristine's three-eyed amulet a clue? an ancient curse? Uncover the chilling secret as you puzzle your way through unlock the ancient gates of TriJinx.

item.title: Luxor Deluxe
item.description: The mysterious goddess, Isis, has enlisted you to battle Set and his evil minions. With 88 mind-blowing levels, the challenge will not be an easy one.

item.title: Hotel Solitaire Deluxe
item.description: Welcome to Hotel Solitaire. Each of the hotel's 20 floors has 5 rooms, each with its own game of solitaire. Play 15 different card games on 100 levels, either against the clock or with no time limit.

item.title: Text Express Deluxe
item.description: Play Text Express Deluxe whenever you want! Make words up to 7 letters long and try the new Action game.

item.title: MahJongg Mystery Deluxe
item.description: Play MahJongg Mystery Deluxe offline whenever you want! Choose between many different levels and 3 tile-sets! Play classic or arcade mode, for beginners and masters!

item.title: Bejeweled 2 Deluxe
item.description: Play Bejeweled 2 Deluxe whenever you want! Four ways to play: Classic, Action, Puzzle and Endless!

item.title: Delicious Deluxe
item.description: Have you always dreamed of opening your own restaurant? Are you no stranger to multi-tasking? With Delicious Deluxe, here's the opportunity to roll up your sleeves.

item.title: Shangri La Deluxe
item.description: Solve all word puzzles and unlock all 48 levels. Make sure the water flows freely again from the waterfalls in Shangri La's cave.

item.title: Babel Deluxe
item.description: Welcome to Babel, the city where words were invented. Play 25 different word games to build an impressive tower, but don't let the words confuse you, or your tower will start to crumble!

item.title: Pop and Drop Deluxe
item.description: Ball-bouncing fun awaits you in Pop & Drop Deluxe. Develop nerves of steel in the Action game mode and test your strategy in Perpetual.

item.title: Tropix Deluxe
item.description: We're going on a tropical vacation! If you like puzzles, adventures, Sudoku or card and word games, Tropix Deluxe has something for everyone.

item.title: Mah Jong Quest Deluxe
item.description: Play Mah Jong Quest Deluxe whenever you want! Reveal unique tiles that provide special powers!

item.title: Jewel of Atlantis Deluxe
item.description: An undersea adventure of puzzling fun awaits you in Jewel of Atlantis Deluxe. Featuring gorgeous undersea graphics, a wide variety of brain-teasers and hours of family fun, it is the ultimate puzzling adventure.

item.title: Super Collapse! 3 Deluxe
item.description: Super Collapse! 3 Deluxe is here! Experience the adventure in Quest mode or enjoy the classic game in Quick Play. Once you start clicking, you won't be able to stop!

item.title: Feeding Frenzy 2 Deluxe
item.description: The sequel to Feeding Frenzy: here's Feeding Frenzy 2 Deluxe! Gobble your way up the food chain. Eat or get eaten!

item.title: Word Slinger Deluxe
item.description: Sling and string together words on the board to earn maximum points. But place them carefully, you don't want to get stuck!

item.title: Mahjong Escape Deluxe
item.description: Mahjong Escape Deluxe contains 6 different layouts, 15 hand-painted backgrounds and 5 relaxing soundtracks. You have never felt more relaxed!

item.title: Chuzzle Deluxe
item.description: Googly-eyed little balls of fur that giggle, squeak, and sneeze as you push them across the board! Once you start popping Chuzzles you might not be able to stop!

item.title: Bricks of Atlantis Deluxe
item.description: Brick-busting under the sea in the ruins of Atlantis! Explore the lost worlds as you bust your way through 190 levels of magic fish, harpoon guns and power-ups.

item.title: Feeding Frenzy Deluxe
item.description: It's survival of the biggest in this action-packed deep-sea challenge. Better be quick on your tail or you'll be gobbled up alive!

item.title: Diner Dash 2 Deluxe
item.description: Flo's back and better than ever in Diner Dash 2 Deluxe! Seat customers, take orders, collect tips, and help Flo and her friends defeat Mr. Big.

item.title: Insaniquarium Deluxe
item.description: Play Insaniquarium Deluxe whenever you want! 4 Game types and no adverts!

item.title: Incadia Deluxe
item.description: Play Incadia Deluxe whenever you want! Two Game Modes: Adventure and Arcade!

item.title: Aloha Solitaire Deluxe
item.description: Immerse yourself in the idyllic Hawaiian Islands of Aloha Solitaire. Relax with a mix of traditional solitaire and mahjong on the warm sands of Hawaii.

item.title: Shogun Sudoku Deluxe
item.description: In Shogun Sudoku Deluxe you play six different versions of Sudoku. In this historical game, you travel from London to Osaka through 12 levels.

item.title: Mirror Magic Deluxe
item.description: Mirror, mirror on the wall, what's the most magic game of all? Mirror Magic! Spot the five differences in enchanted mirror images and test your observation skills and your nerves!

item.title: Shopmania Deluxe
item.description: Shopmania Deluxe combines puzzle solving, management and strategy. Were you born to shop? Shopmania Deluxe is open 24/7, so go for it!

item.title: Five Card Deluxe
item.description: If you like solitaire and poker, Five Card Deluxe is the game for you. This is your chance to learn poker. Put on your poker face and try your hand at Five Card Deluxe!

item.title: Gem Shop Deluxe
item.description: Slide colored gems to create matches of three or more. Sell gems and jewelry to smiling customers, but watch out - keep them waiting too long and they will start to grumble.

item.title: Giftshop Deluxe
item.description: The Christmas rush has started in your gift shop! Sell gifts to happy customers, but be attentive, because they'll get grouchy if they have to wait too long!

item.title: Pizza Frenzy Deluxe
item.description: The Stromboli family needs your help! Join Lorenzo, Paula, and the whole Stromboli clan to bring their age-old pizza recipe to the hungry masses.

item.title: Rainbow Web Deluxe
item.description: Free the Rainbow kingdom by breaking the spell cast over this mythical realm. Solve over 50 puzzles to bring the sunshine back to this mystical land of fairies and elves.

item.title: Mosaic - Tomb of Mystery Deluxe
item.description: This spellbinding new puzzler takes you back in time to Ancient Egypt and the time of the Pharaohs. Mosaic: Tomb of Mystery is a fun and mesmerizing blend of puzzle-pieced excitement and intense gameplay. Give it a try today!

item.title: Big Kahuna Reef Deluxe
item.description: Discover amazing aquatic life as you search for the Mask of the Tiki in this classic puzzle game.

item.title: Big Money Deluxe
item.description: Play Big Money Deluxe offline whenever you want! All new graphics, dazzling special effects and three different game types: Action, Strategy, and Puzzle will satisfy both arcade fans and puzzle nuts!

item.title: Big Kahuna Reef 2
item.description: Big Kahuna Reef is back: and how! The calm of the deep sea will now be disrupted for ever more, because Big Kahuna Reef 2 Deluxe is more explosive than ever!

item.title: Acropolis Deluxe
item.description: Travel across mythical lands and unearth stunning relics in this lexical adventure. Link letters to find words in 50 levels with 10 special tile types and electrifying power-ups.

item.title: Dynomite Deluxe
item.description: Play Dynomite Deluxe offline whenever you want! Try the new game modes Time Trial and the Fossil Challenge

item.title: Magic Inlay Deluxe
item.description: Play Magic Inlay Deluxe whenever you want! Additional magical tools and 3 play modes!

item.title: Cubis 2 Deluxe
item.description: Play Cubis 2 Deluxe whenever you want! 300 beautifully hand-crafted levels!

item.title: Bunny Bounce Deluxe
item.description: Welcome to the Bunny Bounce Reunion. This isn't just another game of "three of a kind"; it's a new and unique way of matching. The game contains over 70 levels and 3 game modes!

item.title: Tumblebugs Deluxe
item.description: You hold the fate of your colorful beetle buddies in your hands as you save them from being enslaved.

item.title: Cubis Deluxe
item.description: Play Cubis Deluxe whenever you want! Play the exciting new Puzzle game!

item.title: Twistingo Deluxe
item.description: An evil wizard has captured and hidden the cute furry animals on a mysterious island. You must use your bingo skills to explore the island and save the animals.

item.title: Aloha TriPeaks Deluxe
item.description: Take a balloon ride over the Hawai'ian Islands in Aloha TriPeaks. Relax and discover it all without leaving the comfort of your home.

item.title: Pastime Puzzles Deluxe
item.description: Jigsaw puzzles just like you used to do round the kitchen table, without ever having to worry about losing a piece!

item.title: Caramba! Deluxe
item.description: Embark upon an adventure in sunny Mexico! Play Caramba in 15 different locations with this tough game of skills

item.title: Da Vinci's Secret Deluxe
item.description: Da Vinci's Secret Deluxe is an exciting puzzle adventure with one twist after another. Discover the secrets that are hidden in Leonardo da Vinci's works of art.

item.title: Bricks of Egypt 2 Deluxe
item.description: Back to block busting in Bricks of Egypt 2 Deluxe! Visit the Egyptian pyramids to go treasure hunting in the uncovered secret passage.

item.title: Caribbean Mah Jong Deluxe
item.description: Visit 12 Caribbean islands on a luxury cruise in Caribbean Mah Jong Deluxe! A tropical surprise for your gray matter.

item.title: Shape Shifter Deluxe
item.description: Match the incoming pieces to the moving shapes. Complete a row and watch it disappear.

item.title: Luxor Amun Rising Deluxe
item.description: Use your mystical winged scarab to shoot magical spheres, making matches of three or more to destroy the approaching colored spheres. The powers of Isis are again at your command.

item.title: Hexalot Deluxe
item.description: As Merlin, King Arthurs most trusted advisor, it is up to you to build bridges across treacherous puzzlescapes, and bring the Knights of the Round Table back to Hexalot!

item.title: Iggle Pop Deluxe
item.description: Iggle Pop! puts a fun new spin on an all-time classic maze adventure. It's undeniably addictive! Too cute to resist! Easy to play!

item.title: Adventure Inlay Safari Edition Deluxe
item.description: Adventure Inlay is new and improved! Place gems correctly on the board to fill it out just right.

item.title: Adventure Inlay Deluxe
item.description: Plan your strategy as you advance through multitudes of hand crafted levels in this mind-bending puzzle game!

item.title: Treasure Pyramid Deluxe
item.description: Treasure Pyramid Deluxe is a puzzle adventure game that will take you on an unforgettable journey through the undiscovered temples and ruins of Egypt.

item.title: Bounce Out Blitz Deluxe
item.description: In Bounce Out Blitz you have to move the bouncy balls around the bin to line up three of the same to remove them. With three unique challenging game modes there's something for everyone.

item.title: House of Cards Deluxe
item.description: Play House of Cards Deluxe whenever you want! Play 10 exciting solitaire games, including FreeCell, Pharaoh's Solitaire, and Fifteens.

item.title: Diner Dash Deluxe
item.description: You're a one-woman show in this frantic restaurant sim. Diner Dash Deluxe allows you to forget about your dailly routine and dream about your very own restaurant business.

item.title: Word Mojo Deluxe
item.description: Play Word Mojo Deluxe whenever you want! Timed and Un-timed mode!

item.title: Glyph Deluxe
item.description: In Glyph Deluxe you use the powers of the elements Wood, Fire, Water, Metal and Air in 255 sumptuous levels and 5 different worlds.

item.title: Sudoku! Deluxe
item.description: Sudoku! Deluxe is full of helpful features that make it fun for everyone. Whether you're already hooked or you're new to it, Sudoku! Deluxe is sure to be your next favorite puzzler!

item.title: Alchemy Deluxe
item.description: Play Alchemy Deluxe offline, anytime, with this enhanced Windows version! Features fantastic special effects, soundtrack and hints, and a new Timetrial-gamemode!

item.title: Beetle Bomp Deluxe
item.description: Experimental electricity eating beetles have been released from a top secret laboratory. Solve the buggy mystery before the lights go out for good!

item.title: Rocket Mania Deluxe
item.description: Play Rocket Mania Deluxe whenever you want! Play three exciting game modes!

item.title: Cosmic Switch Deluxe
item.description: Play Cosmic Switch Deluxe offline whenever you want! Always wanted to pause your Cosmic Switch game for a moment? Now you can! Of course this downloadable game also has enhanced graphics and sounds.

item.title: Heavy Weapon Deluxe
item.description: Hold down left mouse button to fire. Take out the enemy and stay alive while you're at it.

item.title: Legend of Aladdin Deluxe
item.description: Swap icons in the grid to make horizontal or vertical matches of 3 or more icons of the same kind. When making a match, the underlying tiles will be filled with red carpet.

item.title: Big Kahuna Words Deluxe
item.description: We travel back to the awe-inspiring reef for a new word game in Big Kahuna Words Deluxe. This exciting torrent of words contains two game modes and 150 levels.

item.title: Diamond Mine Deluxe
item.description: Play Diamond Mine Deluxe offline whenever you want with this supercharged version of the hit game! 3D gems, hints on demand, high score lists, and a pulse-pounding soundtrack are just a few of the new features.

item.title: Lost City of Gold Deluxe
item.description: Match three to unlock the gold on a journey like no other! Travel through dangerous jungles, mysterious caves, and hidden ruins on your quest to claim the gold as your own.

item.title: AstroPop Deluxe
item.description: Play AstroPop Deluxe whenever you want! Choose a story or timed mode!

item.title: Fireworks Extravaganza Deluxe
item.description: Produce your own personalized fireworks extravaganza using the vast array of glorious technicolor fireworks at your disposal.

item.title: Karu Deluxe
item.description: Ready for a new, exciting challenge? In Karu Deluxe you have to catch the balls first before you can fire them!

item.title: House of Cards 2 Deluxe
item.description: Play House of Cards 2 Deluxe whenever you want! Play 10 exciting solitaire games, including Double Klondike and Spider.

item.title: Inca Quest Deluxe
item.description: Join professor Quest on a color-popping journey which will take him through 10 temples of adventure, 80 confounding puzzles and 8 levels of the Shaman's survival trial in Inca Quest Deluxe.

item.title: Ancient Sudoku Deluxe
item.description: An addictive brainteaser puzzle that can be solved by lateral thinking alone and has been taking the world by storm.

item.title: Zulu Gems Deluxe
item.description: Journey into the jungles of Africa in search of ancient relics, and collect treasure to fund your research. Smash stones and gather precious gems before they reach the limit.

item.title: Spin and Play Deluxe
item.description: Hurry! Hurry! Step right up and have some fun at the carnival with Spin & Play Deluxe - a theme park packed with attractions for all ages! There are 16 thrilling attractions in all!

item.title: Froggy Castle 2 Deluxe
item.description: You are on a journey with Pit the hamster to free the kingdom from the dreaded frogs. You will encounter numerous hilarious frogs!

item.title: Believe in Santa Deluxe
item.description: Help Sandy save her granny's toy shop. Two cheerful elves are along for the ride, decorating toys for all the customers. Can you satisfy clumsy clowns and tacky tourists?

item.title: Chainz Deluxe
item.description: Un-chain your brain with CHAINZ! Rotate colorful links to create valuable chains in this challenging puzzle game. Set up chain-reactions and incorporate bonus links for increased rewards.

item.title: Penguin Puzzle Deluxe
item.description: Play Penguin Puzzle Deluxe whenever you want! Exquisite puzzle fun is within your reach!

item.title: Kalima Deluxe
item.description: 'Kalima' means 'word' in Swahili. Earn points by making words using a predetermined first and last letter. You can even earn extra points by making several words in one turn!

item.title: Ricochet Lost Worlds Deluxe
item.description: Play Ricochet Lost Worlds Deluxe whenever you want!

item.title: Maui Wowee Deluxe
item.description: In a wonderful variation, Maui Wowee lets you decide if you prefer to slide objects or swap 'em! Of course, all your favorite puzzle features are here too.

item.title: Granny In Paradise Deluxe
item.description: Granny and her kitties have earned a vacation so it's off to paradise for a relaxing break! Fast, fun and easy to learn, Granny in Paradise Deluxe is a delightful diversion for the entire family.

item.title: TipTop Deluxe
item.description: Play TipTop Deluxe whenever you want! Play 3 great game types and 21 unique bonus levels.

item.title: Ricochet Xtreme Deluxe
item.description: Play Ricochet Xtreme Deluxe whenever you want!

item.title: Spacebound Deluxe
item.description: Play Spacebound, the next revolution in puzzle matching. Featuring 3 modes of exciting game play, a humorous storyline, and the cutest aliens you've ever seen!

item.title: Atomica Deluxe
item.description: Play Atomica Deluxe whenever you want! Try the new action mode that challenges you to play in real-time.

item.title: Lotus Deluxe
item.description: Save the lotus flowers in Lotus Deluxe. Nirja, the water nymph will be grateful, because the whirlpools in the jungle of India will swallow all the lotus flowers.

item.title: Honey Switch Deluxe
item.description: Play Honey Switch Deluxe offline whenever you want! Always wanted to pause your Honey Switch game for a moment? Now you can! Of course this downloadable game also has enhanced graphics and sounds.

item.title: Pixelus Deluxe
item.description: Play Pixelus Deluxe whenever you want! Unlock special bonus puzzles!

item.title: The Da Vinci Code Deluxe
item.description: Lead your character through dark corridors and old European streets while each step leads closer to the biggest mystery of all The Da Vinci Code.

item.title: Splash Deluxe
item.description: Splash is an action, puzzle and strategy packed game that is both addictive and fun! With distinctive power-ups and bonus games, this is one game you'll never forget.

item.title: Family Feud
item.description: What is the most exiting quiz game ever? Number one answer is: Family Feud! This famous TV game show now has an addicting game version!
